articles.author: Zosha Millman
articles.title: Uniqlo’s new Spy x Family shirts let you rep the year’s best anime series
articles.description: Anya Folger has become a meme thanks to 12 episodes of Spy x Family. But while you wait for the new season (and the dub) to release, you can sport Uniqlo’s latest T-shirt collection.
articles.content: When Anya Folger isnt busy putting bullies in their place, taking over the manga universe, or helping with her dads missions, she is sporting the latest Eden Academy looks, and now you can too or at … [+1006 chars]

articles.author: Joshua Rivera
articles.title: Watch the gameplay trailer for The Lord of the Rings: Gollum
articles.description: It’s not a movie starring Chris Hemsworth, but the first gameplay trailer shows off lots of stealth sequences. So many stealth sequences. We hope you like stealth sequences. The game is available on PC, PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S …
articles.content: It lookses like wet fishes doesnt it, precious, yes

articles.author: Owen S. Good
articles.title: Apex Legends Mobile gets season 2 release date and new Legend: Rhapsody
articles.description: Apex Legends Mobile season 2 begins July 12 for players on Android and iOS devices. The new season brings Rhapsody, another new character exclusive to the mobile game.
articles.content: Next season gets started July 12 on Android and iOS

articles.author: Toussaint Egan
articles.title: Daredevil and Kingpin will appear in Marvel’s Echo series
articles.description: Charlie Cox and Vincent D’Onofrio will be reprising the roles of Daredevil and Kingpin in the upcoming MCU television series Echo. Cox and D’Onofrio recently appeared as their respective characters in Spider-Man: No Way Home and Disney Plus’ Hawkeye series.
articles.content:
Charlie Cox and Vincent DOnofrio will be reprising their roles as Daredevil and Kingpin in the upcoming MCU television series Echo. 
The series takes place after the events of Hawkeye and stars Alaq… [+1076 chars]

articles.author: Michael McWhertor
articles.title: New Terminator survival game announced, a series first
articles.description: Nacon’s Terminator Survival Project will let players try to survive the events of Skynet’s Judgment Day nuclear apocalypse, without the help of John Connor’s Resistance.
articles.content: Nacons Terminator Survival Project coming in the distant future

articles.author: Owen S. Good
articles.title: Ubisoft’s Skull and Bones launches in November on PC, PS5, and Xbox
articles.description: Ubisoft confirmed that Skull and Bones, an open-world pirate sim set in the Indian Ocean, will launch Nov. 8 for Amazon Luna, Google Stadia, PlayStation 5, PC via the Epic Games Store, and Xbox Series X.
articles.content: Ubisofts open-world pirate sim arrives Nov. 8 for PlayStation, PC, and Xbox

articles.author: Ana Diaz
articles.title: LilyPichu takes exclusive deal with YouTube
articles.description: LilyPichu is a popular streamer both on Twitch and YouTube and a member of the content creation group OfflineTV (OTV). On Thursday, she announced that she will exclusively stream on YouTube.
articles.content: Her streams will be hosted exclusively on YouTube starting Friday

articles.author: Michael McWhertor
articles.title: RoboCop Rogue City is a new FPS coming next June, starring Peter Weller
articles.description: Nacon shows off first gameplay of RoboCop: Rogue City in a new trailer that also confirms a June 2023 release on Switch, PS5, Xbox Series X, and PC.
articles.content: Peter Weller reprises his role as RoboCop in Rogue City

articles.author: Toussaint Egan
articles.title: Cursed to Golf, Sea of Stars, and other new PlayStation indie game trailers
articles.description: Sony dropped new trailers and details for seven upcoming indie games coming soon PlayStation, including Cursed to Golf, The Tomorrow Children: Phoenix Edition, SCHiM, and Sea of Stars.
articles.content: Sony revealed several new trailers on Thursday for upcoming indie games coming to PlayStation consoles. Theres a wealth of great games and genuine surprises here, including Inscryption coming to Play… [+2359 chars]

articles.author: Cass Marshall
articles.title: Frustrated Red Dead Online fans get a pretty dire update from Rockstar
articles.description: Red Dead Online and GTA Online will both receive updates, according to an update from Rockstar Games — but Red Dead fans shouldn’t expect too much from new missions and releases.
articles.content: GTA Online and Red Dead Online are very similar in theory. Theyre both online multiplayer versions of Rockstars massive open worlds, set in a modern day San Andreas and the western frontier circa 189… [+2754 chars]
